metadata.title: CVE-2017-9412 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The unpack_read_samples function in frontend/get_audio.c in LAME 3.99.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory readand application crash) via a crafted wav file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
